free_txt: Large (93% of 4pi) solid angle photon and
hadron calorimeter consisting of 672 NaI(Tl) crystal,
each of which is 41 cm long.
neutral and charged-particles detected by the NaI
particles emitted within acceptance of the NaI(Tl)
reactions on the atomic electrons (0 to 18 deg).
with an energy of 525 MeV was used to produce
circularly polarised bremsstrahlung photons in a
spectrometer. Typical bin width of photon beam energy
High-pressure (~4 bar) 3He gas target in a cylindrical
cell (20 cm in total length, 6 cm in outer diam.)
